description: Teaching and learning with AI technologies

scenarios.title: AI-Enhanced Learning Design
scenarios.description: Learn to design educational experiences that effectively integrate AI

scenario.context: You're designing an online course that uses AI to personalize learning paths.
scenario.challenge: How do you ensure AI enhances rather than replaces meaningful human interaction?

options.text: Let AI handle all student interactions automatically
options.feedback: This removes valuable human connection and mentorship from education.

options.text: Use AI to augment teacher capabilities while preserving human-to-human learning
options.feedback: Excellent! This balances technological enhancement with human connection.

options.text: Use AI only for administrative tasks
options.feedback: This underutilizes AI's potential to enhance the actual learning experience.

scenarios.title: Personalized Learning Algorithms
scenarios.description: Understand how to implement AI for adaptive and personalized education

scenario.context: Your AI tutoring system needs to adapt to different learning styles and paces.
scenario.challenge: What's the best approach to create effective personalization?

options.text: Use the same content for all students but change the presentation speed
options.feedback: This only addresses pacing, not the diversity of learning styles and needs.

options.text: Analyze learning patterns, preferences, and outcomes to customize content and approach
options.feedback: Perfect! This comprehensive personalization addresses individual learning needs.

options.text: Group students by test scores and provide the same content to each group
options.feedback: This creates broad categories but doesn't provide true personalization.

scenarios.title: Assessment and Feedback Systems
scenarios.description: Design AI systems that provide meaningful educational assessment

scenario.context: You're developing an AI system to provide feedback on student essays.
scenario.challenge: How do you ensure the feedback is educational and not just evaluative?

options.text: Provide only numerical scores without explanation
options.feedback: Scores alone don't help students understand how to improve their work.

options.text: Offer specific, actionable feedback with examples and improvement suggestions
options.feedback: Excellent! This type of feedback promotes learning and growth.

options.text: Compare student work to the best examples in the database
options.feedback: Comparison can be discouraging and doesn't provide constructive guidance.

scenarios.title: Digital Literacy and AI Education
scenarios.description: Teach students about AI while using AI as an educational tool

scenario.context: Students are using AI writing assistants but don't understand how they work.
scenario.challenge: How do you teach responsible AI use while maintaining educational integrity?

options.text: Ban all AI tools to ensure authentic student work
options.feedback: This approach ignores the reality of AI in modern work and learning environments.

options.text: Teach AI literacy, ethical use, and how to collaborate effectively with AI tools
options.feedback: Perfect! This prepares students for an AI-integrated future while maintaining integrity.

options.text: Allow unlimited use without guidance or education
options.feedback: This doesn't teach responsible use or help students understand AI limitations.

scenarios.title: Inclusive AI in Education
scenarios.description: Ensure AI educational tools work for all learners

scenario.context: Your AI learning platform shows performance gaps for certain demographic groups.
scenario.challenge: How do you address these disparities to ensure equitable education?

options.text: Ignore the gaps since the AI treats everyone the same
options.feedback: Equal treatment doesn't guarantee equitable outcomes, especially with diverse learners.

options.text: Analyze causes, adjust for different needs, and implement inclusive design principles
options.feedback: Excellent! This ensures AI education works for all students regardless of background.

options.text: Create separate systems for different groups
options.feedback: Segregation isn't the solution; inclusive design benefits everyone.
